# ids

**Instance Property**

The identifiers of all the equipment in this collection.

## Declaration

```swift
var ids: [EquipmentIdentifier] { get }
```

## Getting collection properties

- **count**: The number of equipment items in this collection.
- **state**: The collection of equipment states.

items.description: The number of equipment items in this collection.
